name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"5cf4ea48-21ce-4763-b641-6c7fa76f94cf","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class Documentation: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"LiteralPointer","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b6b8b6b3-b938-486a-8878-1df6dd7b8cf5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"LiteralPointer","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a specialized subclass of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Pointer","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" designed to handle raw constants found in source code (such as ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""Hello"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"42","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). In static analysis, tracking the exact value of every string or integer can lead to "state explosion." Instead, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"LiteralPointer","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" provides a layer of abstraction by categorizing data while still preserving the underlying literal value if it matches expected types.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1cff415d-ff3d-4db4-8423-7ccec3db54f0","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"57d5eb78-233b-44b9-a20a-a308a4f34681","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Constants","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"458b82aa-ffa8-4066-860d-214c259552e7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"STR_LIT","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Represents the abstract category ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""STRING"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a2b38198-b592-4be4-b177-df646203630f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"INT_LIT","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Represents the abstract category ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""INTEGER"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"852ab806-a974-40a3-86ea-99449fd1a97c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"UNK_LIT","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Represents the abstract category ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""UNKNOWN"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", used for types that do not fall into the primary categories.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3577dc00-e972-4471-98a6-6fc339348c2c","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"1e8d53c2-5e87-40e8-acef-6e2b78144e59","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fb8802f8-97d0-475e-b0f0-d43dc3f7ddfa","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"add(item)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Overrides the base ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Pointer.add","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method. Instead of blindly adding any object, it performs type checking to ensure only valid literals are tracked, or falls back to an "Unknown" classification.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"2aa7d559-5123-4987-b06e-34f24ae72197","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"item","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"str","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The string itself is added to the values set.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3bbe54d5-4da2-4e75-967c-aae73919a4f5","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"item","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"int","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The integer itself is added to the values set.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6673e7df-4b92-4c2d-ac84-97732b72945c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Otherwise: The constant ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"UNK_LIT","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""UNKNOWN"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") is added.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"5978e4af-8577-433a-8619-243196d49b15","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"cb2b47a6-fd60-423c-b87b-cb4f5c13942d","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2beffc31-9123-47af-a1fe-378d3539bd64","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"LiteralPointer","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is used by the analyzer when it encounters direct assignments of constants.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a0625cbf-9dae-43ea-80df-5b0f2b8b103d","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"from pointers import LiteralPointer

# Create a pointer for a variable assigned a literal value
lit_ptr = LiteralPointer()

# 1. Adding a string literal
lit_ptr.add("database_connection_string")

# 2. Adding an integer literal
lit_ptr.add(5000)

# 3. Adding an unsupported type (e.g., a list)
lit_ptr.add([1, 2, 3])

# 4. Inspection
print(lit_ptr.get()) 
# Output: {'database_connection_string', 5000, 'UNKNOWN'}","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bf197ea7-bb77-471a-8f7d-aa8a787f3b85","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2231b56d-133e-422d-936c-8d9068dd69ba","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Type Normalization","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": This class ensures that the analysis engine can distinguish between a variable that points to a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"definition","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (like a function or class) and a variable that holds a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"literal value","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cd2e8a98-7567-4260-acaf-bf1b9f84ed40","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Safety","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By mapping complex or unsupported types to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"UNKNOWN","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it prevents the analysis engine from attempting to process data structures it isn't equipped to track, maintaining system stability during large-scale scans.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d7898984-51b9-4275-a986-688f66cff179","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Inheritance","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Since it inherits from ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Pointer","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it can still be merged with other pointers, allowing literal values to propagate through the code just like variable references.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c775d84d-a613-437d-9053-83c97e7e9be6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
